name: Non-Disclosure Agreement
description: Confidentiality agreement to protect sensitive business or personal information

sections.title: NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT
sections.content:
This Non-Disclosure Agreement (the "Agreement") is entered into as of {effective_date} (the "Effective Date"), by and between:

{disclosing_party_name}, located at {disclosing_party_address} (the "Disclosing Party"),

and

{receiving_party_name}, located at {receiving_party_address} (the "Receiving Party").

sections.title: 1. PURPOSE
sections.content: The Disclosing Party wishes to disclose certain confidential and proprietary information to the Receiving Party for the purpose of: {purpose_of_disclosure} (the "Purpose").

sections.title: 2. DEFINITION OF CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
sections.content:
For purposes of this Agreement, "Confidential Information" means any information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party, either directly or indirectly, in writing, orally or by inspection of tangible objects, that is designated as "Confidential" or would reasonably be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. Specifically, Confidential Information includes, but is not limited to:

{confidential_information_definition}

sections.title: 3. EXCEPTIONS TO CONFIDENTIALITY
sections.content:
The Receiving Party's obligations under this Agreement do not extend to information that is:

{exceptions_to_confidentiality}

sections.title: 4. OBLIGATIONS OF RECEIVING PARTY
5. TERM AND TERMINATION
sections.content: This Agreement shall remain in effect for {agreement_duration} from the Effective Date. The Receiving Party's obligations with respect to Confidential Information shall survive termination of this Agreement.

sections.title: 6. RETURN OF MATERIALS
sections.content:
Upon the termination of this Agreement, or upon the Disclosing Party's earlier request, the Receiving Party shall:

{return_of_materials}

sections.title: 8. REMEDIES
sections.content:
The Receiving Party acknowledges that any breach of this Agreement may cause irreparable harm to the Disclosing Party for which monetary damages may be inadequate. Accordingly:

{injunctive_relief}

sections.title: 9. GOVERNING LAW
sections.content: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of {jurisdiction}, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

sections.title: 11. GENERAL PROVISIONS
sections.content:
a) This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof.

b) This Agreement may not be amended except by a written agreement signed by both parties.

c) The invalidity or unenforceability of any provision of this Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other provision.

d) {survival_clause}

sections.title: 12. SIGNATURES
